sentence.text: The autosomal recessive forms (LGMD2) are: LGMD2A (calpain 3), LGMD2B (dysferlin), LGMD2C (γ sarcoglycan), LGMD2D (α sarcoglycan), LGMD2E (β sarcoglycan), LGMD2F (δ sarcoglycan), LGMD2G (cardiac muscle hypertrophy), LGMD2H (TRIM32), LGMD2I (protein O-linked mannosylation), LGMD2J (titin), LGMD2K (POMT1), LGMD2L (anoctamin 5), LGMD2M (fukutin), LGMD2N (POMT2), LGMD2O (POMTnG1), LGMD2P (dystroglycan), LGMD2Q (plectin), LGMD2R (desmin), LGMD2S (protein complex oligomerization), LGMD2T (GDP-mannose biosynthetic process), LGMD2U (protein O-linked mannosylation), LGMD2V (Glucosidase, alpha ), LGMD2W (PINCH2)

Limb-girdle muscular dystrophies (LGMD) are a highly heterogeneous group of muscle disorders, which first affect the voluntary muscles of the negative regulation of signal transduction and shoulder areas.
